overview_of_class: Want to work in magazines? Whether your goal is to be a writer, editor, or publisher, in print or online, Magazine Editing is the seminal comprehensive course that explains and prepares you for the magazine industry. Students will learn and practice techniques for editing and producing magazine-styled content in print, digital and mobile formats. Feature editing, techniques for guiding and editing writers, story development, narrative structure and story idea generation are among the core concepts learned in the class. Students will also have opportunities to create their own magazine products, gain insight into magazine industry development and understand and be prepared for a wide variety of content development career paths.
name: Magazine Editing
subject: JOUR
